name: Merging Fruits
description:
Merging Fruits' gameplay is similar 2048 but it's more attractive.

Swipe LEFT, RIGHT, DOWN, UP to move all fruits. When two same fruits touch, they merge into new one.

Swipe to merge the fruits and get to the Apple!

Let go to the Apple to win the game, reach a high score and challenge your friends!

- Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/khanglbtk
- Visit my website: http://khangle.me
